column3: We take our dogs to this park as it has a great walking trail the dogs like the trail and we do as well lols of open space and no gang issues nice bathrooms as well

Vincent Lugo Park is famous for its dinosour, dragons and theme play area for kids. It is not a big size park but it has enough sitting areas for family gatherings. It has a baseball field and now a walking trail. I love the new little workout machines that you can use for specific body parts and they are placed throughout the park.
Wonderful park with fun play sculptures for kids, park area with grass and a full size baseball field. Great place for photo ops.
